quote: A man who doesn't spend time with his family can never be a real man
author: Vito Corleone

quote: I'm as mad as hell and I'm not gonna take this anymore!
author: Howard Beale

quote: Champagne for my real friends, real pain for my sham friends!
author: Monty Brogan

quote: If you think of yourself as funny, you become tragic.
author: Seymour Moskowitz

quote: As far back as I can remember, I always wanted to be a gangster
author: Henry Hill

quote: What we've got here is ... failure to communicate
author: Captain

quote: You don't make up for your sins in church. You do it in the streets
author: Charlie

quote: I was a better man with you, as a woman... than I ever was with a woman, as a man.
author: Michael Dorsey

quote: Madness! Madness!
author: Dr. Clipton

quote: After fifteen minutes I wanted to marry her, and after half an hour I completely gave up the idea of stealing her purse.
author: Virgil Starkwell

quote: Not only are you rich, but you want to be loved as if you are poor.
author: Garance

quote: Is it safe?
author: Dr. Christan Szell

quote: You get some gorgeous eyes, d'you know...
author: Jean

quote: I know who I am!
author: Harry Angel

quote: Paris is small for those who share so great a passion as ours.
author: Garance

quote: You were a tomato! A tomato doesn't have a logic, a tomato can't move!
author: George Fields

quote: Don Corleone
author: Peter Clemenza

quote: There is something very important we need to do as soon as possible. What's that? Fuck!
author: Bill & Alice Harford

quote: I love you. I've loved you since the first moment I saw you. I guess maybe I've even loved you before I saw you.
author: George Eastman

quote: When you side with a man, you stay with him. And if you can't do that, you're like some animal, you're finished.
author: Pyke

quote: I want that you tell me... was she feeble-minded? My mother! Was she feeble-minded? Was she?
author: Rudolph Petersen

quote: You're out of order! You're out of order! The whole trial is out of order! They're out of order!
author: Arthur Kirkland

quote: Remember when you was a kid and you would spend the whole year waiting for summer vacation and when it finally came it would fly by just like that? It's funny, Jimmy, life has a way of flying by faster than any old summer vacation really fucking does.
author: Easy Wind

quote: Time. Time. What is time? Swiss manufacture it. French hoard it. Italians squander it. Americans say it is money. Hindus say it does not exist. Do you know what I say? I say time is a crook.
author: O'Hara

quote: Eddie, you're a born loser
author: Bert Gordon

quote: Forget about it
author: repeated line

quote: Once you start compromising your thoughts, you're a candidate for mediocrity
author: Arnold Epstein

quote: You sho' is ugly!
author: Shug Avery

quote: Why don't you squeeze a watermelon out of the hole of an opening of a lemon and see how hot you look?
author: Mollie

quote: It ain't about how hard ya hit. It's about how hard you can get it and keep moving forward. How much you can take and keep moving forward. That's how winning is done!
author: Rocky Balboa

quote: I'll remember you, honey. You're the one that got away
author: Hud Bannon

quote: I'm Godzilla! You are JAPAN!
author: Critical Bill

quote: Merciful death, how you love your precious guilt
author: Lestat de Lioncourt

quote: In Switzerland they had brotherly love - they had 500 years of democracy and peace, and what did that produce? The cuckoo clock.
author: Harry Lime

quote: You are the greatest lover I've ever had. Well, I practice a lot when I'm alone.
author: Countess Alexandrovna & Boris

quote: Elaaaaaaine! Elaaaaaaine!
author: Benjamin Braddock

quote: I know, you did send me back to the future, but I'm back -- I'm back FROM the future ...
author: Marty McFly

quote: You want me to hold the chicken, huh? I want you to hold it between your knees
author: Waitress & Bobby Dupea

quote: Granny Snuff, ever been snuffed out?
author: Ben

quote: Don't ever take sides with anyone against the Family again. Ever.
author: Michael Corleone

quote: The greatest trick the devil ever pulled was convincing the world he didn't exist ... and like that, he's gone
author: Roger 'Verbal' Kint

quote: Hey, Solomon, Sliman... Are you guys cousins?
author: Victor Pivert

quote: At least you'll never be a vegetable - even artichokes have hearts
author: Am√©lie Poulain

quote: Once I buried two Arabs in a wall over there... Facing Mecca, of course.
author: Ben

quote: You talkin' to me?
author: Travis Bickle

quote: You can have my answer now, if you like. My final offer is this: nothing. Not even the fee for the gaming license, which I would appreciate if you would put up personally.
author: Michael Corleone

quote: Solomon, you're Jewish?
author: Victor Pivert

quote: Wait. You dropped your phony dog poo What phony dog poo?
author: Cedric & Blindman

quote: It's easier to die for a woman than to find one worth dying for.
author: Aristocrat

quote: Finance is a gun. Politics is knowing when to pull the trigger
author: Don Luchesi

quote: We're judged by the company we keep. A misjudgment. Judas kept excellent company.
author: Aristocrat & Gregoire Ponceludon de Malavoy

quote: Everybody be cool, this is a robbery! Any of you fuckin' pricks move and I'll execute every last fucking one of ya ...
author: Ringo & Yolanda

quote: Just one more thing Sofie. Is she aware her daughter is alive?
author: Bill

quote: Hello. My name is Inigo Montoya. You killed my father. Prepare to die
author: Inigo Montoya

quote: These go to eleven
author: Nigel Tufnel

quote: I said 'Bizarre bizarre'? How bizarre. Why would I have said, 'Bizarre, bizarre'? I assure you, my dear cousin, that you said 'Bizarre bizarre'. Did I say 'Bizarre'? How bizarre...
author: Bishop Soper and Pr. Molyneux

quote: Hey, amigo! You know you have a face beautiful enough to be worth $2000? Yeah, but you don't look like the one who'd collect it.
author: Bounty hunter & Blondie

quote: Yo Adrian, I did it!
author: Rocky Balboa

quote: Noodles, I slipped
author: Dominick

quote: You call that a knife? This is a knife!
author: Mick Dundee

quote: I see dead people
author: Cole Sear

quote: See you at the party, Richter!
author: Douglas Quaid

quote: All right, Mr. De Mille, I'm ready for my close-up
author: Norma Desmond

quote: Fasten your seatbelts, it's going to be a bumpy night
author: Margo Channing

quote: I wish you was a wishing well, so I could tie a bucket to you and sink you
author: Tom Powers

quote: Play 'Misty' for me
author: Evelyn Draper

quote: A floor-rag... How beautiful! I'm so happy! It's a sweater.
author: Pierre & Therese

quote: Why am I Mr. Pink?
author: Mr. Pink

quote: Things would be much as they are now. Perhaps. Except maybe I wouldn't have named our son Elvis.
author: Alabama Whitman

quote: You know...hostility is like a psychic boomerang.
author: Waitress

quote: Non!
author: Marcel Marceau

quote: I can feel that tonight ... I'll make it with her
author: Jean-Claude Dusse

quote: Hasta la vista, baby
author: T-800

quote: Regulators!
author: repeated line

quote: Favor gonna kill you faster than a bullet
author: Carlito Brigante

quote: I wanted to destroy something beautiful
author: The Narrator

quote: Now let me correct you on a couple of things, OK? Aristotle was not Belgian. The central message of Buddhism is not Every man for himself. And the London Underground is not a political movement.
author: Wanda

quote: They do taste home-made! Hand-made, and rolled under the armpits.
author: Mr. Preskovitch

quote: Remember who you are
author: Mufasa

quote: But this ship can't sink! She's made of iron, sir! I assure you, she can... and she will. It is a mathematical certainty.
author: Ismay & Thomas Andrews

quote: Bingo!
author: Lt. Frank Drebin

quote: Look Bernard... I think you and I have the same problem: the point is that we cannot really rely on our looks, especially you. So let me give you a piece of advice: forget you don't stand a chance, and just go for it! Who knows, it might work out of a missunderstanding!
author: Jean-Claude Dusse

quote: I hate to speak ill of people. Such a nice person indeed!
author: Pierre

quote: Nuskat Muss! Nuskat Muss, Herr Muller!
author: Mr Septime

quote: Atmosphere? Atmosphere? Do I look like an atmosphere?
author: Raymonde

quote: Have you ever seen a grown man naked?
author: Captain Clarence Oveur

quote: We're both part of the same hypocrisy, senator, but never think it applies to my family.
author: Michael Corleone

quote: They was giving me ten thousand watts a day, you know, and I'm hot to trot! The next woman takes me on's gonna light up like a pinball machine and pay off in silver dollars!
author: R.P. McMurphy

quote: You owe me MONEY!
author: Bert Gordon

quote: After all, tomorrow is another day
author: Scarlett O'Hara

quote: A man's got to know his limitations
author: Harry Callahan

quote: Adriaaaaaaaaaaan!
author: Rocky Balboa

quote: Well, there wasn't enough time, Michael. There wasn't enough time We'll get there, Pop. We'll get there
author: Vito & Michael Corleone

quote: Party's over!
author: Lionel Cosgrove

quote: Run Forrest, Run!
author: repeated line

quote: Althoooooough... I HAVE developed a greater appreciation for the female version of the human anatomy... ARROOOOO!
author: Howard the Duck

quote: Let me be frank! Can I still be Garth?
author: Honey Hornee & Garth Algar

quote: I'm more man than you'll ever be and more woman than you'll ever get
author: Mindy

quote: Well, nobody's perfect
author: Osgood Fielding III

quote: Wait a minute. I'm the leader, I say when it's the end ... It's the end.
author: Napoleon
